dict.acceptation: 拿，取；采取；接受（礼物等）；耗费（时间等）；
捕获量；看法；利益，盈益；（入场券的）售得金额；

sent.orig: Take you to take a look at superlative degree other take a bath for!
sent.trans: 带你看看最高级别的洗澡！

sent.orig: They take turns to take care of him.
Hades: Take this weapon, Kratos, take this power, and use it to defeat your enemies.
sent.trans: 哈迪斯：拿上这武器，克瑞托斯，带上这力量，用它来击败你的敌人们。

sent.orig: What commercial incentives would it take for developers to take advantage of such changes?
sent.trans: 开发商利用这些变化来产生何种商业动机？

sent.orig: Allergic people shall not take royal jelly, they shall take queen bee placenta.
sent.trans: 有过敏体质的人群不宜服用蜂王浆。改服“蜂王胎宝”。
